cpl.name: Simple Layout Launcher
cpl.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/simple-layout-launcher
cpl.description: Vanilla style launcher, with Metro style square button and large icon.
cpl.readme:
!! Procedure

This plugin provides a simple layout switcher which can be used with this procedure call:

```tid
<<simple-layout-launcher>>
```

<<simple-layout-launcher>>

---

!! 过程

本插件提供了一个简单的布局切换器，它可以通过这个过程调用来使用：

```tid
<<simple-layout-launcher>>
```

<<simple-layout-launcher>>
